pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Jake Arrieta; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .146 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .273 off him after that.
Jake Arrieta is trying to tie up Cliff Pennington with fastballs inside; Pennington is hitting .250 on pitches in that location compared to .189 overall.
